ANU.name: Geoff Cary
ANU.biography: Geoff is on the Editorial Advisory Committee, and an Associate Editor, for the International Journal of Wildland Fire. He was a Discipline Panel Member for the Excellence in Research for Australia 2015 and 2018 ANU submissions, and has served on the NSW Parks & Wildlife Advisory Council. Geoff serves on the CoS Reserch Committee and Reconciliation Action Plan Committee, FSES Local Area Consultative Committee, and recently the ANU WHS Fieldwork Advisory Group, ANU Statistical Consulting Unit Advisory Committee and was a mentor in the NECTAR early career Mentoring Program. Geoff is Associate Director (Research) in the Fenner School and has previouly served as Associate Director for Higher Degree Research.
